SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PART 1 LINE 9 - PUBLICLY TRADED SECURITIES FROM 63 DONORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE ARE NO COMMITTEES WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED INTERNALLY AND REVIEWED BY INTERNAL MANAGEMENT. THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY OUTSIDE TAX PREPARER. PRIOR TO FILING A COPY IS PROVIDED TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. SCHEDULE B IS NOT INCLUDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT/QUESTIONNAIRE IS MAILED TO ALL BOARD OF TRUSTEE MEMBERS IN THE FALL. THE FORMS ARE RETURNED IN A STAMPED SELF ADDRESSED ENVELOPE TO THE HEADMASTER'S ASSISTANT. IF THERE IS AN ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL CONFLICT IT IS DISCLOSED TO AN OFFICER OF THE ORGANIZATION SO THAT SAFEGUARDS CAN BE ESTABLISHED TO PROTECT ALL PARTIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION DETERMINATION - FOR THE HEADMASTER - THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD ANUALLY PERFORMS A PERFORMANCE REVIEW AND SETS GOALS WITH THE HEADMASTER. COMPARABILITY DATA FROM SCHOOLS OF SIMILAR TYPE ARE REVIEWED. COMPENSATION IS SET FROM THIS REVIEW. FOR ALL OTHER EMPLOYEES - THE BOARD APPROVES OVERALL SALARY PACKAGES FOR ALL OTHER EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE PROVIDED WHEN REQUESTED.
THE PROCESS FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
